page.title: 01Landscape in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
{ {Pauntley}is very beautiful with small hills and valleys rich with wild flowers, especially{daffodils. } {Orchards, vineyards, mixed farming and {market gardening}give the area its unique quality.
The narrow roads wind through deep sandstone cuttings and along the tops of the ridges, giving wonderful views. Keavy winter snows make these roads impassable.
The{advantages}of living here, outweighing all the disadvantages, are the peace and quiet, the strong community spirit, and the wide variation in social structure.
